title: URBANopt Line
description: Schema for an URBANopt RNM Line object

Code.description: Unique name/ID of the feature in the RNM analysis.

NodeA.description: Name/ID of the RNM 'From' Node it is associated with.

NodeB.description: Name/ID of the RNM 'To' Node it is associated with.

Equip.description: Type of line used. Options can be found in the electrical catalog.

Status.description: Line Status. If 1, the power line is closed (operating); if 0, the line is open (not operating).

Phases.description: Phase of the line. If single phase, options are: A, B, or C (separated from 3-phase). If 3-phase: ABC.
